file_content.text: <<1>> has challenged you to a duel.
Request Duel
Surrender Duel
You left the duel perimeter.
You entered a non-dueling region.
Duel begins <<1[now/in $d second/in $d seconds]>>!
Fight!
You must select a player in order to duel.
You have had too many duel requests rejected in a short time. You must wait before you can request another duel.
<<1>> has declined to duel with you.
You are already in a duel.
<<1>> is already in a duel.
You cannot request a duel while surrendering.
<<1>> cannot accept duel requests while surrendering.
You are in a non-dueling area.
You are too far away from <<1>> to request a duel.
You cannot request a duel while you are in a non-dueling region.
<<1>> cannot accept duel requests while in a non-dueling region.
You cannot start a duel while in combat.
<<1>> cannot accept duel requests while in combat.
<<1>> rejected a duel too recently. You must wait before requesting a duel.
You have challenged <<1>> to a duel.
You cannot accept a duel without a valid request.
You have accepted <<1>>'s challenge to a duel.
<<1>> has accepted your challenge to a duel.
You don't have a duel request to reject.
You have declined to duel with <<1>>.
Your duel with <<1>> has been interrupted.
You won your duel with <<1>>!
You lost your duel with <<1>>.
<<1>> has won a duel with <<2>>!
<<1>> has left the dueling perimeter.
<<1>> is busy.
You cannot do that right now.
You cannot duel yourself.
